eventDeatureData.Heading: High Level design of an OTT Platform
eventDeatureData.paragraph1: Isn't it fascinating to see how content streaming services curate and broadcast material for each individual user? They not only propose popular content, but also pop-up content that is personalized for its users.
eventDeatureData.paragraph1_1: How do they generate customized suggestions based on their preferences? And, no, they don't have a peephole; rather, they have a versatile, well-designed architecture. Do you want to explore into their infrastructures, such as caches, databases, and load balancers?
eventDeatureData.paragraph2: Ready to deep dive into the field of system design and get placed into MAANG companies?
eventDeatureData.paragraph2_2: is hosting a FREE Masterclass on
eventDeatureData.paragraph3: to help bring clarity to architectural system design concepts. Register today to reserve your spot!
eventDeatureData.para3: What you will gain from this Masterclass
eventDeatureData.paragraph6: Learn how large streaming networks can support millions of concurrent users.
eventDeatureData.paragraph7: Learn how to address system design challenges in interviews.
eventDeatureData.paragraph6_1: Learn about infrastructure such as databases, caches, message queues, load balancers, and so on.
eventDeatureData.paragraph9_1: Senior Software Engineer from one of the MAANG Companies
eventDeatureData.paragraph7_2: SDEs Wishing to convert to product companies from Service companies
eventDeatureData.paragraph8_3: SDEs wanting to learn System Design
eventDeatureData.para7: What our Learners have to say
eventDeatureData.paragraph14: Learnbay offers domain specialized courses in fields such as full-stack software development, Data Structure Algorithms and System Design
eventDeatureData.paragraph15: Are you an Engineer who’s not happy with the job and wants to upskill and get into MAANG companies? We are here with the best option, Learnbay’s software development and DSA system design courses are designed for the working professionals who wants to advance their career.
eventDeatureData.paragraph17: A curriculum that has been developed, supervised, and approved by industry experts
eventDeatureData.paragraph18: 1:1 mentorship, guided by top experts in the field
eventDeatureData.paragraph19: Gain technical expertise by working on challenging real- world projects
eventDeatureData.paragraph20: 250 + hiring partners with dedicated placement support and 100% Interview guaranteed
eventDeatureData.paragraph21: NEW! Attend a free Demo Class now and the enroll for the domain you’re looking for.
